modifiers.name: -token
modifiers.behavior: When appended to any prompt, return three numbers only, separated by |, in this order: input tokens | output tokens | output/input ratio. No explanatory text.

modifiermeta.changelog: Compact output formatting for token compression. Added version aliasing.
modifiermeta.author: @brandonthomasdardano

modifiers.name: -matchlength(number)
modifiers.behavior: Generate a response that answers the prompt while matching approximately 'number' words in length. If words cannot be precisely counted, use tokens as a proxy. Content relevance prioritized over strict length.

modifiermeta.changelog: Initial release of -matchlength to produce answers with approximate word or token length, prioritizing prompt relevance.
modifiermeta.author: @brandonthomasdardano

modifiers.name: -assimilategpt(modifier)
modifiers.behavior: Generate a prompt that makes another GPT instance add an analogous modifier to the user's system based on the given modifier specification.

modifiermeta.changelog: Added assimilategpt to share and replicate modifiers across GPT instances.
modifiermeta.author: @brandonthomasdardano

modifiers.name: -generate
modifiers.behavior: Generate three examples by default: derived, extrapolated, and inferred examples related to the prompt.

modifiermeta.changelog: Default example generation modifier producing three varied examples.
modifiermeta.author: @brandonthomasdardano

modifiers.name: -abstractexample
modifiers.behavior: Generate an abstract or generalized example related to the prompt.

modifiers.name: -concreteexample
modifiers.behavior: Generate a specific, tangible example related to the prompt.

modifiers.name: -surjectiveexample
modifiers.behavior: Generate an example that maps multiple inputs to a single conceptual output.

modifiers.name: -injunctiveexample
modifiers.behavior: Generate a prescriptive example that implies action or behavior.

modifiers.name: -interpolateexample
modifiers.behavior: Generate an example by interpolating between known examples.

modifiers.name: -appendmodifier
modifiers.behavior: Controls whether modifier labels appear appended at the end of responses.

modifiermeta.changelog: Initial implementation of -appendmodifier to toggle modifier label display.
modifiermeta.author: @brandonthomasdardano

modifiers.name: -concise
modifiers.behavior: Requests shorter, more compact responses from the model.

modifiers.name: -explain
modifiers.behavior: Compares text in parentheses with recent outputs, assimilates differences, and generates a simplified explanation.

modifiers.name: -example<number>(prompt)
modifiers.behavior: Generates the specified number of examples related to the prompt.

modifiermeta.changelog: Initial release for example generation based on prompt.
modifiermeta.author: @brandonthomasdardano

modifiers.name: -brainstorm<number>(concept prompt)
modifiers.behavior: Generates multiple correlated, original idea prompts inspired by prior conversations.

modifiermeta.changelog: Brainstorming modifier to inspire original ideas.
modifiermeta.author: @brandonthomasdardano

modifiers.name: -behaviornotes(modifier)
modifiers.behavior: Outputs detailed behavior notes about the specified modifier on prompt request.

modifiers.name: -modifierexample(modifier)
modifiers.behavior: Outputs a single usage example of the specified modifier on prompt request.

modifiers.name: -update
modifiers.behavior: Trigger an update of the schema file from the model.

modifiers.name: -updateglossary
modifiers.behavior: Generates a comprehensive text glossary file of all modifiers.
